Hey, I finally made my Standard Magic Items for Dungeon World in pocketmod format!<br /><br />This is for when you didn&#39;t bring the DW book, but want to give players those sweet, sweet magic items. It&#39;s tiny! <br />I hope it comes in handy for you, as it has for me. <br /><br />Oh, and here it is <i>not</i> in pm format:<br /><a href="https://drive.google.com/open?id=1EtgoZLHLca7NQJtYYgKHPilb6wSW9bRA" class="ot-anchor">https://drive.google.com/open?id=1EtgoZLHLca7NQJtYYgKHPilb6wSW9bRA</a><br />


Attachment:

<a href='https://drive.google.com/open?id=17W1-sYnnBpa0jSvRZaoci5hkFkEfKE68'>standard magic items pm.pdf</a>
